definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be wide, spacious (NH id., extend (intrans.), [[רֶוַח]] wide space; Ar. rawih.a be wide (between thighs), and deriv.; cf. perhaps Eth. raxawa: make open, open (der. spec.; Di:293); Aram. [[רְוַח]] be wide (usu. fig. as Heb.), roh., ruwh. be wide, enlarged);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ר]]:, sq. [[ל]] pers. 1Sa 16:23 fig. there was enlargement, relief, for Saul; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִרְוַח לִי]] Job 32:20 that there may be relief for me.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[מְרֻוָּחִים]] Je 22:14 spacious (of rooms; ‖[[בֵּות מִדּוֹת ]]).
